Sentencas: Hydrogen, combined with fuel cell technology, is an option for reducing our reliance on hydrocarbon-based fuels.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers

Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolyser cells (SOECs) have been studied as a possible technology to produce hydrogen from steam.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers

Sentencas: As the current global energy mix is heavily reliant on hydrocarbon-based fuels, utilising existing technologies such as coal fired power plants, combined with SOECs in an integrated system, may enable a path towards reducing carbon dioxide emissions as well as creating a way of introducing 'cleaner' fuel.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers

Sentencas: In this work, a steady state model of a SOEC was developed and used to assess the feasibility of using hot steam from a power plant as feed to a SOEC.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers

Sentencas: The main objective was to study the ways of improving the SOEC efficiency.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers

Sentencas: The most favourable feed for the SOEC was to extract steam prior to the intermediate pressure turbine, which showed SOEC efficiency improvement of 25% compared with conventional SOEC operation of heating water at 25 degrees C.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers

Sentencas: The thermoneutral point of 4644Am(-2) was shown to be a guide for assessing design and operation options with heat integration possibilities after this point.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers

Sentencas: For scenarios of 7% steam extraction and a purely H-2 production plant, 250 MW (7500 kg h(-1)) and 290 MW (8700 kg h(-1)) H-2 can be produced with SOECs sized at 43,300 and 50,100 m(2), respectively.
Titulo: A modelling approach to assessing the feasibility of the integration of power stations with steam electrolysers
